originalText.text: Dr. Zimbler is an absolute gem! He is a highly skilled surgeon with an artist's eye. He is positive, warm and has an entirely informed professional manner. He puts you at ease and his care and follow through is impressive. I am so happy I had the opportunity to work with Dr. Zimbler and his equally impressive staff!

text.text: Dr. Zimbler is an absolute gem! He is a highly skilled surgeon with an artist's eye. He is positive, warm and has an entirely informed professional manner. He puts you at ease and his care and follow through is impressive. I am so happy I had the opportunity to work with Dr. Zimbler and his equally impressive staff!

originalText.text: Dr. Zimbler is a gifted surgeon and a kind, caring and fun human being. His surgical talents made me look younger and fresher in a natural and “seamless” way. His personal qualities turned what might have been a difficult experience into a happy and relaxed one. His staff was helpful, supportive and on top of things throughout. I am so grateful to all of you. Bravo and thank you. xoxo

text.text: Dr. Zimbler is a gifted surgeon and a kind, caring and fun human being. His surgical talents made me look younger and fresher in a natural and “seamless” way. His personal qualities turned what might have been a difficult experience into a happy and relaxed one. His staff was helpful, supportive and on top of things throughout. I am so grateful to all of you. Bravo and thank you. xoxo

originalText.text:
Dr. Zimbler is  all you could ask for in a plastic surgeon. His demeanor and bedside manner put you at ease immediately. You will find Dr. Zimbler to be knowledgeable, engaging, gentle, attentive and candid. The results of my nasal reconstruction exceeded my expectations. I would recommend Dr. Zimbler without reservation to any family member or friend!
You will also find his office to be inviting and immaculate. Barbara, your first point of contact, is caring, and always there to help with a smile. Jenna is a gem and handles all billing and insurance issues minimizing the stress of dealing with insurance companies and hospitals. And, Ana, his PA is personable, present for every appointment, extremely informative and easily accessible for questions. Overall, an excellent experience-start to finish!

originalText.text:
I cannot praise Dr. Zimbler and his entire staff highly enough. My experience was fantastic from my first consult visit, through the actual procedure, to the final postoperative visits. Jenna went above and beyond with insurance issues. Thanks to Dr. Zimbler my field of vision has doubled.
I highly recommend this practice.

originalText.text: I’ve had a fantastic experience with Dr. Zimbler’s office! He made sure to attend to all my worries and truly made me feel comfortable and confident with my procedure! Jenna was fantastic with staying on top of the insurance company to make sure I received reimbursement. I would highly recommend Dr. Zimbler to anyone!
